fullplot: A 12-year-old boy goes missing in 1978, only to reappear once more in 1986. In the eight years that have passed, he hasn't aged. It is no coincidence that at the time he "comes back", a flying saucer is found, entangled in power lines.
plot: In 1978, a boy is moved 8 years into the future and has an adventure with the alien ship that is responsible for that.
title: Flight of the Navigator
